title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 701.13 - Appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 701.13 - Appeal

State Regulations

Appeals from decisions shall be pursuant to CPLR Article 78
unless a different statutory provision governs appeal in the particular
instance, or unless review may be had under Article 3 of the Labor

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
701.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
